sentence.Network_en: Hammer Blast: Eldritch blast deals normal damage to objects.
sentence.Network_cn: 锤击之焰: 魔焰对物体造成正常伤害.

sentence.Network_en: Eldritch giants have a + 6 racial bonus on Will saves.
sentence.Network_cn: 邪术巨人的意志豁免有+6种族奖励.

sentence.Network_en: Eldritch giants are powerful scions of arcane lore.
sentence.Network_cn: 邪术巨人是神秘奥术知识的强大传承者.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 来看看用英语破译出的Dev吧_奥拉星吧... ... D=die， 死去 e=eldritch， 怪异的，骇人的 v=vulgarity， 粗俗的人，庸俗的人.
eldritch giants speak Abyssal , Common , Giant , and Terran .邪术巨人讲深渊语、通用语、巨人语和土族语。
国外乐队大集合_guodalu_新浪博客 ... Elis 伊利斯 Eldritch 爱尔德里奇 Empyrium 天堂.
YAMB设置帮助 - u2_rock的日志 - 网易博客 ... ("Meph") 墨菲斯托 ("Eldritch") 怪异者 ("Trav") 崔凡克.

list.abs: 魔力之链(Eldritch Chain)邪术等级:次等,魔焰塑形等价法术等级:4说明:此塑形术能改进你的魔焰,将其转变为一道能量弧,可从一个目标“跳”至其他目标。一道魔力之.

eldritch giant confessors believe in the divinity of magic itself , justifying their cruel actions with a philosophy that proclaims that whatever you can accomplish through magic is morally correct .邪术巨人笃信者信仰魔法本身所具有的神性，宣扬通过魔法取得的一切东西在道德上都是正确的，凭借这个哲学，他们把自己的

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 16th cent. (originally Scots): perhaps related to elf

means.word_mean: 1. suggesting the operation of supernatural influences;

sentences.sentence: "stumps...had uncanny shapes as of monstrous creatures"- John Galsworthy
"he could hear the unearthly scream of some curlew piercing the din"- Henry Kingsley

auth_sentence.content: Lydia gave a screech of eldritch mirth.
